abstract: The Washington art band Bluebrain's new iPhone app is a grand orchestral guide to the streams, forests and rock faces of Central Park.
snippet: The Washington art band Bluebrain's new iPhone app is a grand orchestral guide to the streams, forests and rock faces of Central Park.
lead_paragraph: When that great emerald and hilly patch at the center of Manhattan first opened, music was limited to brief concerts under the Naumberg Bandshell. Today, of course, Central Park is fixed in sonic history - landmark rock shows, global benefits, swanky midsummer soirees - so diverse that any attempt to fuse the park's streams, forests and rock faces into a single musical experience seems almost futile.

headline.main: For iPhones, a Central Park Soundtrack
